description: Deployed your Mustang Survival Khimera PFD? This kit contains everything you need to re-arm it, so you're ready for your next day out on the water.Contains one 12g CO2 cylinder, 1 green indicator pin, and a re-arm manual.Compatible only with Mustang Survival Khimera Hybrid PFD.
name: Mustang Survival Re-Arm Kit (MA7116)
